body_html:
@mhlopko Update: I am not sure whether the flag --cxxopt="-D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0" is still relevant for the case when only the c++ compiler is invoked so I also tried to run BAZEL_USE_CPP_ONLY_TOOLCHAIN=1 bazel build //foo without the above flag. I get a similar error though, see enclosed.

logs_update.txt

body:
@mhlopko Update: I am not sure whether the flag `--cxxopt="-D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0"` is still relevant for the case when only the c++ compiler is invoked so I also tried to run `BAZEL_USE_CPP_ONLY_TOOLCHAIN=1 bazel build //foo` without the above flag. I get a similar error though, see enclosed.

[logs_update.txt](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/files/2335869/logs_update.txt)
